html:
12.15.19  7:04 pm   12.13.19  10:12 pm fair enough, i guess i believe you but it's a little difficult. have you always had this skill or was it something you had to learn? of not taking things personally and not getting angry at people for doing dumb or dangerous stuff, driving or otherwise? 

     i actually always wondered why most people are so insanely hypocritical while driving. it seems to me that 90% of things that drivers get mad at other drivers for, are actually insanely reasonable things, that they've certainly done themselves. like for example, car 1 is making a right turn. but there happens to be someone crossing a crosswalk, blocking their right turn. car 2, behind car 1, is freaking out and going apeshit at car 1 for 'just waiting there'. but there is a perfectly good reason car 1 is waiting there. they are doing a classic maneuver called 'making a right turn without killing the walking person.' Every single day i watch drivers freak out at other drivers for doing perfectly good and totally normal things. i did not have to learn how not to be angry at them for it, but i am still learning how such anger and shortsightedness could occur

12.15.19  6:59 pm   What is your favorite word?

     cart wheel

12.15.19  6:45 pm   what the fuck is "me" you know. every time i try to make it clear who i am i just get more confused

     this is to ensure you have a fantastic time

12.15.19  6:27 pm   What do you think of Sundays? 

     i love how they are right in the center of the week

12.15.19  6:24 pm   what do you think about simulation theory?

     i would prefer theory simulation. seems more useful

12.15.19  6:22 pm   Favorite childhood memory?

     trying to figure out where the heck i am

12.15.19  5:46 pm   Which do you prefer?

     this

12.15.19  5:33 pm   i want to do everything but i end up doing nothing 

     i know how that feels

12.15.19  5:04 pm   It is 4am. you hear a strange noise from downstairs.

     that's not true

      you investigate. when you reach the first floor, you see a strange light coming from the kitchen. you walk towards it. standing in your kitchen, looking in your fridge, is you.

     none of this has been true so far

      what do you do? (asking for a friend)

     continue trying to amount to something

12.15.19  4:55 pm   best cereal?

     lumps of goup

12.15.19  4:48 pm   Is the s or the c silent in scent?

      neither of them are silent, but they both sound the same and are said simultaneously. they also have no smell, ironically

12.15.19  4:41 pm   interested to see what you release next

     me too

12.15.19  3:56 pm   why is the sun so sunny?

     that is due to sunshine, and sunnyness

12.15.19  3:51 pm   Some of your songs make you seem like a sad lonely person, but other songs make you seem happy and eccentric person. Have you ever experienced existential dread?

     yes! then i came up with some solutions and i am still drowning in the solutions, so that's good news i suppose

      You're a hard person to figure out... Whatever your answer is, I'll probably agree with you anyway.

12.15.19  3:51 pm   how do you feel about the accordian

     i have mixed feelings about the accordion

12.15.19  3:50 pm   how do you feel about bubble wrap?

     very good!

12.15.19  3:38 pm   why are you so amazing

     could be some kind of defense mechanism

12.15.19  3:36 pm   you know how in math they can say something like, "let a=b" right? what happens if you dont let a=b?

     then it wouldn't

12.15.19  3:06 pm   do you know the secret dance?

     yes, but i have an advantage there because i am at liberty to make up my own

12.15.19  2:59 pm   Why do we sometimes cry when vibrations in the air formed into patterns hits our ears?

     due to the greater implications

      Why would evolution care about music?

     it cares about you, and you care

      Do you believe in God?

     that's a great word and it means a million things. many of which i can certainly get behind

12.15.19  2:01 pm   how do i consume babies

     wait til they get older, they will consume themselves

12.15.19  2:01 pm   how many eggs do you eat a day

     don't worry about it

12.15.19  2:00 pm   Did you ever record yourself getting into a car accident

     fortunately no, not yet, but i was recording when my car broke

12.15.19  2:00 pm   there is no point of caling this the questions page if you are willing to answer things that arent questions

     i disagree wildly

12.15.19  1:37 pm   With "The Days Gone By" on might quit video u saw Bob Ross and decided to put that in a part or it just appeared like cuz y not

     i cannot remember what appears in either of the 2 occurences of that lyric, and for superstitious reasons i am not allowed to check

12.15.19  1:15 pm   What's your favorite word?

     moo cow

12.15.19  1:15 pm   I just made a snowman with my nephew, and he gave the snowman headphones. I liked the idea. Then we got back inside and we are drinking hot chocolate. Do you remember the last time you made a snowman? Did something interesting happen?

     i have never made a snow person

12.15.19  12:31 pm   You are egg?

     i am a whole basket full of eggs

12.15.19  12:20 pm   opinions?

     no way

12.15.19  12:12 pm   Can you show me one of your drawings?

     sure

12.15.19  12:10 pm   Is a hot dog a sandwich?

     when it's prepared properly, it is a soup

12.15.19  11:47 am   Have you ever asked a question on the questions page?

     only in white text, in response to someone else's question. i have never asked one of the purple questions

12.15.19  11:08 am   How to lose at spelling

     like this

12.15.19  9:55 am   how do I make oatmeal

     export a video to mp4 with a low bitrate

12.15.19  9:41 am   give me something creative to do while squeezed on a bus for forty minutes on frequent occasion

     learn to prime factorize long numbers in your head. actually no don't do that, that's very unhealthy. write stories instead

12.15.19  9:40 am   How many months will be in 2020?

     12 unless something goes horribly wrong

12.15.19  9:40 am   is santa claus real?

     it's you

12.15.19  9:25 am   What's it going to take for me to realize that I'm good enough?

     see other people succeed who are not as good

12.15.19  9:16 am   My siblings decorated our Christmas tree without me! What should I do?

     you could steal christmas, or at least try to

      Also happy holidays

12.15.19  6:07 am   How do you feel about straws?

     pretty good, but they still don't allow you to drink cake

12.15.19  5:54 am   Hi Bill, I've noticed that on the videos that feature your face, heaps of comments say how handsome you are and that they're in love with you. What are your thoughts on this? 

     being your own editor is great, would recommend

12.15.19  5:20 am   Any tips on doing this live journal thing you do? Like the thing you pretend to be a celebrity in and eventually edit it and upload, I started doing a voice only one and I didn't figure out if it's supposed to stay on all the time, or do I turn it on when I have time to just.. do it... and what do I do if I am at school most of the time and can't record due to the noise or looking like an idiot?

     just do it sometimes, occasionally. and then only keep doing it if you get ADDICTED AND CAN'T STOP, AND CAN'T EVEN FUNCTION WITHOUT IT

12.15.19  5:01 am   what is your opinion on the state of west virginia

     not west enough. still very east, in the scheme of things

12.15.19  4:55 am   Is the earth flat?

     no, but it certainly looks that way in pictures

12.15.19  3:40 am   The intro to Might Quit is so fr*cking good. Idk if you've become way way better at mixing over the years but it makes me really happy to hear your music. I hope you are doing really well and don't feel too much pressure from your "fans". I miss you a lot.

     holy smokes you are very friendly

12.15.19  3:05 am   It is 3 in the morning, what should I do?

     analyze your entire life

12.15.19  2:42 am   why not just buy an island

     that's a lot of responsibility, you have to take care of it, and feed it,

12.15.19  2:38 am   Thank you for making your music, it helps me when I am sad. I don't quite understand it consciously, but emotionally it really helps me sometimes. Is this how you meant for your stuff to be?

     i try to make it helpful in as many ways possible, to increase the likelihood that it may help you in some way

12.15.19  2:38 am   why can't i meet the deadline?

     because it's too soon! and also you are too slow

12.15.19  2:03 am   what's the okayest question you've ever recieved

     this one, by far
